title: Cant find a match in the 5v5 Summoners rift soloQ
body: I have now been searching for a match for 20 minutes and yet, none has been found. I tried to just cancel the search and reque up but its still going on... Just tell me if im the only one who has that problem or i its a general problem... Sorry for my English its not my first language.

replies.body: I went ahead and double-checked on our end and we haven't seen any server wide reports of players waiting an extremely long in queue.  Given that you experience this fairly consistently every time you enter the queue, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  In order to investigate this further, it's best to talk one-on-one!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UORYA4T4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-23T23:05:02.568+0000)
>
> I went ahead and double-checked on our end and we haven't seen any server wide reports of players waiting an extremely long in queue.  Given that you experience this fairly consistently every time you enter the queue, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  In order to investigate this further, it's best to talk one-on-one!

I was in a 15 minute queue a while earlier.. Its really not un common for Golds to face 20 minute queues.
